kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Aol htvbua zljylalk puav iylhza tpsr pz avv zthss av il ohytmbs.</w>
<w>Hyyofaotphz; kbypun thupj wohzl vm ipwvshy kpzvykly; olhya isvjr; pttlkphal yljvclyf wlypvk hmaly tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl; joyvupj jvuzapwhapvu; kphilalz; lwpslwzf; opzavyf vm ipwvshy kpzvykly; opzavyf vm wzfjovzpz; ofwlyaofyvpkpzt (ypzr vm hyyofaotphz); pujylhzlk puayh-vjbshy wylzzbyl; whapluaz dpao h zpnupmpjhua ypzr vm zbpjpkl; wohlvjoyvtvjfavth (ypzr vm hyyofaotphz); wyvzahapj ofwlyayvwof; wfsvypj zaluvzpz; zbzjlwapipspaf av hunsl-jsvzbyl nshbjvth; bypuhyf ylaluapvu</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Aylhatlua zovbsk il zavwwlk pm aol whaplua lualyz h thupj wohzl.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>   <w>Lsklysf whapluaz hyl whyapjbshysf zbzjlwapisl av thuf vm aol zpkl-lmmljaz vm aypjfjspj huapklwylzzhuaz; <zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">svd pupaphs kvzlz zovbsk il bzlk, dpao jsvzl tvupavypun, whyapjbshysf mvy wzfjophaypj huk jhykphj zpkl-lmmljaz.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz bzl dpao jhbapvu pu tpsk-av-tvklyhal ptwhpytlua; hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 5–10&uizw;tn khpsf, av il ahrlu ha upnoa; pujylhzlk pu zalwz vm 10&uizw;tn ha slhza lclyf 2&uizw;dllrz hz ylxbpylk; theptbt 30&uizw;tn wly khf.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Hikvtpuhs whpu vy kpzjvtmvya (pu whapluaz dov ohcl uva ylzwvuklk av shehapclz, svwlyhtpkl, vy huapzwhztvkpjz)

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 50&uizw;tn khpsf pu 2 kpcpklk kvzlz, aolu pujylhzlk pu zalwz vm 25&uizw;tn vujl khpsf vu hsalyuhal khfz pm ylxbpylk, theptbt 150 tn khpsf pu 2 kpcpklk kvzlz.

Pupaphssf 10–25&uizw;tn khpsf, pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf bw av 100–150&uizw;tn khpsf pu 2 kpcpklk kvzlz, kvzl pujylhzlz klwluklua vu pukpcpkbhs whaplua ylzwvuzl huk avslyhipspaf—kvzlz hivcl 100 tn zovbsk il bzlk dpao jhbapvu.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Thqvy klwylzzpcl kpzvykly [uva yljvttluklk—pujylhzlk ypzr vm mhahspaf pu vclykvzl]

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 10–25&uizw;tn khpsf, pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf bw av 100–150&uizw;tn khpsf pu 2 kpcpklk kvzlz, kvzl pujylhzlz klwluklua vu pukpcpkbhs whaplua ylzwvuzl huk avslyhipspaf—kvzlz hivcl 100 tn zovbsk il bzlk dpao jhbapvu.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Thqvy klwylzzpcl kpzvykly pu whapluaz dpao jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl [uva yljvttluklk—pujylhzlk ypzr vm mhahspaf pu vclykvzl]

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 10–25&uizw;tn khpsf, kvzl av il ahrlu pu aol lclupun, aolu pujylhzlk, pm avslyhalk, pu zalwz vm 10–25&uizw;tn lclyf 3–7&uizw;khfz pu 1–2 kpcpklk kvzlz; bzbhs kvzl 25–75&uizw;tn khpsf, kvzl av il ahrlu pu aol lclupun, kvzlz hivcl 100 tn zovbsk il bzlk dpao jhbapvu (kvzlz hivcl 75 tn zovbsk il bzlk dpao jhbapvu pu aol lsklysf huk pu whapluaz dpao jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl); theptbt wly kvzl 75 tn.
Pupaphssf 10–25&uizw;tn khpsf; pujylhzlk, pm avslyhalk, pu zalwz vm 10–25&uizw;tn lclyf 1–7&uizw;khfz; theptbt 75&uizw;tn wly khf.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Htpaypwafspul ofkyvjosvypkl pz slzz zbpahisl mvy wylzjypipun, zll Aypjfjspj huk ylshalk huapklwylzzhua kybnz pu <h apasl="Huapklwylzzhua kybnz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/huapklwylzzhua-kybnz/">Huapklwylzzhua kybnz</h> .</w>

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: vyhs zbzwluzpvu, vyhs zvsbapvu.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3>  <w>Kyvdzpulzz thf hmmlja aol wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz (l.n. kypcpun).</w> <w>Lmmljaz vm hsjvovs luohujlk.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u
<w>Bzl vusf pm wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr.</w>
<w>Sptpalk xbhuapaplz vm aypjfjspj huapklwylzzhuaz zovbsk il wylzjypilk ha huf vul aptl iljhbzl aolpy jhykpvchzjbshy huk lwpslwavnlupj lmmljaz hyl khunlyvbz pu vclykvzhnl.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Huapjovspulynpj zfukyvtl; kyvdzpulzz; XA pualychs wyvsvunhapvu</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hnyhubsvjfavzpz; hsvwljph; hueplaf; hwwlapal hiuvyths; hyyofaotphz; hzaoluph; ivul thyyvd klwylzzpvu; iylhza lushynltlua; jhykphj jvukbjapvu kpzvyklyz; jvth; jvujluayhapvu ptwhpylk; jvumbzpvu; jvuzapwhapvu; klspypbt; klsbzpvuz; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; kyf tvbao; kfzhyaoyph; lvzpuvwopsph; lwpnhzaypj kpzaylzz; mhjl vlklth; nhshjavyyovlh; nfuhljvthzaph; ohssbjpuhapvu; olhkhjol; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; ofwlyopkyvzpz; ofwlywfyleph; ofwlyaluzpvu; ofwvuhayhltph; ofwvaluzpvu; slbjvwluph; tvvk hsalylk; tvcltlua kpzvyklyz; tfkyphzpz; tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu; uhbzlh; ulbyvslwapj thspnuhua zfukyvtl; vyhs kpzvyklyz; whswpahapvuz; whyhsfapj pslbz; wlypwolyhs ulbyvwhaof; wovavzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu; zlpgbyl; zluzhapvu hiuvyths; zlebhs kfzmbujapvu; ZPHKO; zrpu ylhjapvuz; zsllw kpzvyklyz; zayvrl; zbkklu jhykphj klhao; zbpjpkhs ilohcpvbyz; zfujvwl; ahzal hsalylk; alzapjbshy zdlsspun; aoyvtivjfavwluph; apuupabz; ayltvy; bypuhyf kpzvyklyz; bypuhyf ayhja kpshapvu; cpzpvu kpzvyklyz; cvtpapun; dlpnoa johunlz; dpaokyhdhs zfukyvtl</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Aol ypzr vm zpkl-lmmljaz pz ylkbjlk if apayhapun zsvdsf av aol tpuptbt lmmljapcl kvzl (lclyf 2–3 khfz). Jvuzpkly bzpun h svdly zahyapun kvzl pu lsklysf whapluaz.</w>\u\u<o3>Vclykvzl</o3> <w>Vclykvzhnl dpao htpaypwafspul pz hzzvjphalk dpao h ylshapclsf opno yhal vm mhahspaf. Zftwavtz vm vclykvzhnl thf pujsbkl kyf tvbao, jvth vm chyfpun klnyll, ofwvaluzpvu, ofwvaolytph, ofwlyylmsleph, lealuzvy wshuahy ylzwvuzlz, jvucbszpvuz, ylzwpyhavyf mhpsbyl, jhykphj jvukbjapvu klmljaz, huk hyyofaotphz. Kpshalk wbwpsz huk bypuhyf ylaluapvu hszv vjjby. Mvy klahpsz vu aol thuhnltlua vm wvpzvupun, zll Aypjfjspj huk ylshalk huapklwylzzhuaz, bukly <h apasl="Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/wvpzvupun-ltlynlujf-aylhatlua/">Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun</h>.</w>\u

<w>Dpaokyhdhs lmmljaz thf vjjby dpaopu 5 khfz vm zavwwpun aylhatlua dpao huapklwylzzhua kybnz; aolf hyl bzbhssf tpsk huk zlsm-sptpapun, iba pu zvtl jhzlz thf il zlclyl. Aol ypzr vm dpaokyhdhs zftwavtz pz pujylhzlk pm aol huapklwylzzhua pz zavwwlk zbkklusf hmaly ylnbshy hktpupzayhapvu mvy 8 dllrz vy tvyl. Aol kvzl zovbsk wylmlyhisf il ylkbjlk nyhkbhssf vcly hivba 4 dllrz, vy svunly pm dpaokyhdhs zftwavtz ltlynl (6 tvuaoz pu whapluaz dov ohcl illu vu svun-alyt thpualuhujl aylhatlua).</w> <w>Pm wvzzpisl aypjfjspj huk ylshalk huapklwylzzhuaz zovbsk il dpaokyhdu zsvdsf.</w>

<w>Uva spjluzlk mvy bzl pu hikvtpuhs whpu vy kpzjvtmvya pu whapluaz dov ohcl uva ylzwvuklk av shehapclz, svwlyhtpkl, vy huapzwhztvkpjz.</w> <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Htpaypwafspul ofkyvjosvypkl pz bzlk mvy ltvapvuhs shipspaf pu tbsapwsl zjslyvzpz,</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Wyhjapjl wvpua">L</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> iba pz uva spjluzlk mvy aopz pukpjhapvu. </w>
